Service Details: - Offers opportunity to senior gay men to meet others in a safe, supportive, respectful environment- Members are welcome to explore new ideas and activities, connect with others who enjoy similar interests, expand their social lives,  enjoy the company of others, and being with other gay men in a friendly, non-judgmental atmosphere
Eligibility: Self-identifying senior gay men (most 30 years to 90+), their allies, partners, family and friends are welcome.
How to Apply: Please visit the website and leave a message with your contact info to be kept posted on meeting times and locations
Cost: - Currently no charge to participate- Donations welcome
Meetings: 1st and 3rd Mon month, 7:00pm @620 Ellis St, Kelowna
